title: SET_ENTITY_DRAW_OUTLINE_SHADER
content:
0x5261A01A// SetEntityDrawOutlineShader
void SET_ENTITY_DRAW_OUTLINE_SHADER(int shader);Parameters:shader: An outline shader variant.Sets variant of shader that will be used to draw entity outline.Variants are:0: Default value, gauss shader.1: 2px wide solid color outline.2: Fullscreen solid color except for entity.
